name: word-blazor-add-in
title: Create a Blazor WebAssembly Word add-in
shortDescription: This sample shows how to build a Word add-in using .NET Blazor technologies.
longDescription: This sample shows how to build a Word add-in using .NET Blazor technologies. Blazor WebAssembly allows you to build Office Add-ins using .NET, C#, and JavaScript to interact with the Office JS API. The add-in uses JavaScript to work with the document and Office JS APIs, but you build the user interface and all other non-Office interactions in C# and .NET Core Blazor technologies.
